author: becka11y
msg: Camera.getPicture() now saves image to the NSTemporaryDirectory when a file URI is requested.  It used to save to Documents/tmp which then had to be removed at app exit.  This new behavior matches where Capture.getImage() saves the image.

author: becka11y
msg: refs #141 VoiceOver not speaking audio view

No longer set the AudioSession to recording type until press the record button.  That mode was preventing VoiceOver from speaking when view first loaded.  Additional accessibility cleanup:  When the audio view loads was posting an UIAccessibilityLayoutChangedNotification.  It really should be a UIAccessibilityScreenChangedNotification since we are loading a new view.  No need to call setIsAccessibilityElement:YES on standard UI controls.

author: shazron
msg: Fixes #132 - app Temp folder was deleted on app termination, when the contents should be deleted, not the folder itself. This affected YouTube/video playback on non-multitasking apps (on subsequent launches)
